@graph.name: Garlic, Scallion, Jalapeno savory Buns/rolls. vegan - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: These tiny savory buns are super snackable, easy and delicious. Dunk in a hot bowl of soup or fill with your favorite sandwich filling. Vegan Recipe.

itemListElement.name: Garlic, Scallion, Jalapeno savory Buns/rolls. vegan

@graph.name: Garlic, Scallion, Jalapeno Savory Buns/Rolls Vegan
@graph.description: These tiny savory buns are super snackable, easy and delicious. Dunk in a hot bowl of soup or fill with your favorite sandwich filling. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup of scallions/green onions (, green parts finely chopped)
2 Tablespoons organic canola oil or olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add warm water, quick rise yeast and raw sugar. Mix and let sit for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add warm water, quick rise yeast and raw sugar. Mix and let sit for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, add bread flour, whole wheat flour, salt, cumin powder, garlic cloves finely chopped, 1 scallions/green onions, Jalapeno pepper finely chopped. Mix all well together.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, add bread flour, whole wheat flour, salt, cumin powder, garlic cloves finely chopped, 1 scallions/green onions, Jalapeno pepper finely chopped. Mix all well together.

recipeInstructions.text: In the yeast bowl, add 2 Tablespoons organic canola oil or olive oil and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: In the yeast bowl, add 2 Tablespoons organic canola oil or olive oil and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add to it, the flour mixture and knead into a soft dough(knead 4-5 minutes). Add more bread flour if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add to it, the flour mixture and knead into a soft dough(knead 4-5 minutes). Add more bread flour if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Spritz top with oil, cover with towel and let sit for 1.5 hours or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Spritz top with oil, cover with towel and let sit for 1.5 hours or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead dough for a minute, and divide into small balls, half the size of the final bun size you want.
recipeInstructions.name: Knead dough for a minute, and divide into small balls, half the size of the final bun size you want.

recipeInstructions.text: Place balls on parchment. Spritz top with water and sprinkle some sesame seeds. Cover with a towel and let rise for another 50 minutes or until almost doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Place balls on parchment. Spritz top with water and sprinkle some sesame seeds. Cover with a towel and let rise for another 50 minutes or until almost doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 375 degrees F for 20-25 minutes.(until golden and a tap on top sounds hollow)
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 375 degrees F for 20-25 minutes.(until golden and a tap on top sounds hollow)

recipeInstructions.text: Cool on rack for 15 minutes before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool on rack for 15 minutes before serving.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with soups, olive oil, dips, vegan butter spreads or any which way!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with soups, olive oil, dips, vegan butter spreads or any which way!

@graph.keywords: dinner rolls, savory bread, vegan rolls
